title: Military Vehicle - 3 : Sound System for M939 Truck
description: Military Vehicle - 3 Sound System for M939 Truck is the result of the joint work of our experienced programmers and sound designers. Over 70 M939 engine sounds with all the necessary code
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO | HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER


Introducing the "Military Vehicle - 3: Sound System for M939 Truck" – an unparalleled digital masterpiece engineered for the Unreal Engine. This innovative plugin, crafted in C++ with Blueprint integration, brings the iconic American military truck, the M939, to life in stunning detail.


  • Fully controllable 3d-model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, gear and other vehicle's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this vehicle in real life
  • Different sounds from different distance
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication


At the heart of this groundbreaking product is an advanced sound system featuring 70 dynamically controlled audio elements. Each sound is intricately designed to respond to critical vehicle parameters such as engine RPM, speed, and listener distance, ensuring an immersive auditory experience like no other. Whether you're experiencing the growl of the engine from within the cab, the rumble from an exterior perspective, or the ambient noise from a distance, every sound set has been tailored to create a vivid and realistic auditory environment.


Perfect for AAA multiplayer shooters, this plugin offers seamless replication across all multiplayer scenarios, ensuring that every player experiences the same high-fidelity sound, no matter where they are on the battlefield. Our expert sound production team, leveraging years of industry experience and proprietary audio recordings, has captured the true essence of the M939's sonic profile, delivering an authenticity that is second to none.


The "Military Vehicle - 3: Sound System for M939 Truck" is not just a plugin. It's a gateway to a heightened level of realism in digital combat environments. Immerse your players in the raw, powerful sounds of the battlefield, and elevate your game's auditory landscape to extraordinary new heights.


The demo scene is already included in the plugin. You just need to adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video.
technicalDetails:
Code Module: MilitaryVehicle_3_Sound_System (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 6

Number of C++ Classes: 5

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT FOR MULTIPLAYER: VIDEO

  • Enable "MilitaryVehicle_3_Sound_System" and "ChaosVehiclesPlugin" from "Edit > Plugins". Restart UE
  • Adjust the audio settings of the project as shown in the 'How to Use' video
  • Open 'DemoLevel' from '/Engine/Plugins/MilitaryVehicle_3_Sound_System Content/DemoLevel/DemoLevel.umap'.
  • DRIVE!!!


Check MilitaryVehicle_3_SFXComponent_BP to adjust any Vehicle's sound settings.


Support: info@soundfx.studio

Discord: https://discord.gg/HzVuvSuCHr
